entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the river overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries with risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the river. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
